alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Some of these cosmologists pretend that the subject's nearly over, we've just got to do a few more observations, a few more computer calculations. But I think they're missing the whole message of scientific history, which is -- the greatest obstacle to scientific progress in science is the illusion of knowledge; the illusion that we know already what's going on, when we don't!"

- Prof. Mike Disney, Cardiff University, TV program
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Lesson of Scientific History is that the Greatest Obstacle to Scientific Progress is the Illusion of Knowledge
